languageKey.label: Import template objects: Select a storage folder and import the template objects for the Cycle module onto your site.
jQuery Library: Load jQuery library via Google AJAX Libraries API.
Your own jQuery UI Theme: Location of your custom theme (eg. fileadmin/ui-style/jquery-ui-1.8.6.custom.css). Roll your own theme on http://jqueryui.com/themeroller/.
